tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We visited Dr. Basavaraj for male infertility issues in October. At first, we found him very measured with his words and giving less time to a consultation.  Later we understood he is cautious, practical and scientific in his approach with treatment ie he wants to gather all the facts before suggesting a course of action.

At every step of the way, he explained to us the odds of success very candidly, which my husband and I appreciated. 

** *** *** ********* *** *********** ***** ** ************ His understanding of issues plaguing fertility is deep and reasoned. I never felt the need for a second or third opinion around him.

There was a time when we were nervous about embryo transfer, and he brought our faith up with his kind words “Don’t worry ma, itll be alright” :) ..

Thanks to his intervention, we conceived in 4-5 months end-to-end with our first try at IVf. 

The nurses and staff at his clinic are super well- trained at handling scans, injections, retrievals and transfers.  

A good doctor handling your case can impact your life’s outcomes, and Dr. Basavaraj sure did change ours for the better.

We are immensely thankful to him. We would recommend people facing the same issues to visit him without any hesitation.

Minor areas of improvement: 1) His clinic does have a big wait time, so pls be prepared for that and keep time with you handy when you go in. 

Since it is a life changing treatment, I did not view this negatively, but for some it can be frustrating. 

2) sometimes I felt our conversations can be more two-way than one way. For e.g. on precautions on exercise, I had a diff POV but not much time to express it…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had 3 miscarriages in the past. We went to many Doctors in different locations like Kolkata, Delhi, Hyderabad but could not suceed. One of my office colleague advised us to consult him once. Under his guidance & treatment now we are blessed with a baby boy after conceiving naturally. He listens to the problems very patiently & accordingly prescribes treatment. ** **** *** ********* *********** ********* * *** ****** He does not encourage unnecessary usage of money of patients & supported us to try naturally as there was no profound reasons found for the miscarriages.My wife got pregnant after 6 months of consultation. In the 1st trimester, complications started & we again started losing hope but He handled the problem very efficiently & with utmost care. By his treatment, we ultimately crossed 1st trimester. The support staff in his clinic are very friendly & each & everyone in his clinic always have a smiling face. He is a living GOD to us. We often say that Doctors are next to GOD & he is a true example of this. His magical treatment gave us a new life. W/O Him we would not have seen this day. Truly we see GOD through Him. We don't have words to say thanks to Him. We pray to GOD that he gets more strength, courage & blessings from the Almighty so that He can bring more & more happiness in the life of childless couples. I urge to all the childless couples throughout India to come to Bangalore & take his guidance & treatment & by this we can see more & more success stories in the future.

For the details to be shared for treatment was not very clear and when we want to understand the procedure then there were no satisfactory responses and all the statements were ending with we know the best, leave it upto us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Disappointed with the behaviour of doctor.
I had visited after viewing feedback in practo but my experience was really bad.
I booked through practo and after I reached there had to wait for more than one hour.
I raised concern in practo that I am waiting from more than an hour and still waiting.
When I entered to the doctors room then he was so rude and was rudely telling me that it’s not vegetable market that you come and do checkup.You have to give time and so many things he stared telling us.We was like what mistake we did.
We just raised concern from practo because no one in the clinic was telling us the exact time for our turn for consultation.
Now when we started telling our issue then instead of giving some solutions, he was telling something else and not given any proper solution.
It was like not value of money and I can say time which i spent there.My appointment time was 10.15 and I turn came at 11.15. I already had another appointment so I wanted my consultation should be done as per my slot.Instead of understanding our time, he started behaving very rudely and without getting any proper solution we left the clinic.
One thing I got to know is he might helped someone who was really in a condition where he was not getting any help from others so he might helped them but that doesn’t means that who is expecting some solution in early stages is wrong.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: My heartful thank you to doctor Basava Raju devarasetty garu, for giving wonderful treatment I am suffering with pcod since 3 years I have no hope I will get pregnant by the time I visited doctor within 2 months I got pregnant with his guidance and treatment, I would like to thank you chandana bhat madam for giving wonderful guidance on every scan she done to me , highly recommended for infertility patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After failing to conceive post miscarriages inspite of all reports normal, my husband and i decided to visit Dr.Basavaraj at his private clinic,Vishvas fertility at HSR layout.While we thought we would need ivf after a failed iui cycle in other clinic of some other doctor,Dr.Basavarj suggested we go for 3 to 4 iui cycles more before deciding on ivf.He also gave us an option to chose for natural pregnancy ,if we had enough patience as our reports were all normal.My husband and i decided to go ahead with iui.After my second iui cycle at Vishvas fertility,my pregnancy tests were postive and  i am now due for delivery in a few months.I had a horrible experience of pain during iui done by some other doctor,while both iui procedures done by Dr.Basavarj were without any pain or discomfort.We would recommend Dr to every couple looking for an fertility specilist.Doctor is very very systematic,has a patient hearing to all problems of his patients,takes the right decision what is best for the patient.*** **** ****** ** **** *** ** *** ** **** ******Sometimes the waiting period can be as long as 1 hour(Not always though),but i would say it is worth the wait as doctor gives enough time for each patient and some patients have lot of queries to ask Dr first time they visit him for consultation which is mainly the reason for long waiting hours.Dr is always on time and busy attending the patients the moment he enters the clinic.Hsr clinic is very hygenic and follows all the protocols that a fertility clinic is supposed to follow.Lastly,the great tagline of this clinic which is so apt and true for this clinic 'Believing is Everything'.Just believe Dr.Basavaraj and you will never repent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnant,Infertility,Men's Health,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Male Sexual Problems,
review: **** **** ******* **** *** **** ** *** ***** very empathic, cool and knock the issue with root cause, will not force for any costly treatment unless really required, ********** *** ****** ***** ** ****** *** ** ****** ******** we thanks to him, he take care till first trimester only, but till that point he will perform his duty well, only area is lacking us emergency response, but as a doctor hundreds of patients will be their it will be difficult for him to reply, anyway our family thanks him a lot 😀

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********************* ** ** ********* ****** **** * ***** ********* ***** *** ******* *the best part is his confidence to handle and explain a problem schematically too,I visited him in Vishwas Fertility clinic HSR for uterine fibroid problem for my wife and is very happy for the successful surgical removal of the same ( laproscopic mymectomy ),he is indeed a magnificent doctor and a must visit for all gynecological and infertility issues .
Dr.Basava instills faith in patients that echoes the name of his clinic .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: I had difficulty conceiving due to endometriosis. I went to many doctors and fertility clinics but did not conceive. Finally visited Dr.Basvaraj in Vishwas Fertility clinic. Though every fertility clinic more or less follows the same procedures I felt Vishwas Fertility clinic does not over charge. I also liked the doctors patience in explaining and he never gives false hopes. even the support staff were friendly and courteous. Even though lots of patients throng their clinic I really liked that they maintained proper records and reminded me about important dates. I finally conceived through IVF and delivered healthy girl baby. My baby girl is now 3 months old and I'm forever grateful to Dr. Basvaraj and all their staffs

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dear Dr. Basavaraj Devarashetty,

We hope this note finds you well. We wanted to take a moment to express our deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and assistance you provided throughout our journey with infertility.

Your expertise, compassion, and dedication have made a profound impact on our lives. Your comprehensive approach and willingness to explore various treatment options gave us hope when we needed it the most. Your patience in addressing our concerns and answering all our questions helped alleviate the anxiety that often accompanies such a challenging process.

We are incredibly grateful for the personalized attention you provided throughout our treatment. Your professionalism and knowledge, combined with your warm and empathetic demeanor, created a supportive environment where we felt valued and understood.

Thanks to your expertise and guidance, we have been blessed with the joy of parenthood. Our gratitude knows no bounds, and we will forever remember your pivotal role in this journey. Your commitment to helping individuals and couples overcome infertility is truly admirable, and we are fortunate to have had you as our doctor.

Once again, thank you, Dr. Basavaraj Devarashetty, for your unwavering support and exceptional care. We are blessed with a lovely and healthy baby girl. You have made a profound difference in our lives, and we are forever grateful.

With heartfelt appreciation,

Bipin & Neha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was struggling to get pregnant for 4 long years and consulted three doctors to conceive. But, didn't succeed after spending lot of money on medicines and tests. Then we consulted Dr. Basavaraj after seeing positive review in internet. Doctor took step by step approach to treat the problem so that I could get a viable pregnancy. During the treatment I got pregnant for the first time in my life but unfortunately I misscarried in the initial phase itself. After that I had another miscarriage and ectopic pregnancy. Finally after one year of trying I was able to conceive without any issues and delivered a healthy baby boy few months back. During our treatment, we have full faith and trust on him. We believed that if I would ever get pregnant after so many issues, it would be with his treatment only. He is very calm, polite and sensitive person. He always gives time and courage to each patient to overcome any difficulty. We would like to recommend him for people who are struggling to conceive for long time. He is God to us. May God bless him for healthy, happy and long life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He listens to the problem very carefully and also remembers the last discussion with his patients. He shares his honest opinion and is very humble. He is very clear with his prescription and not forcing any unwanted medicine or treatment. I will definitely recommend his advice.

review: There is no COVID precaution at the clinic. No sanitisation or temperature check. Since the clinic is still being set up several maintenance workers are also coming in and going out. Two hours after the scheduled appointment still waiting for my turn. BTW the address here is wrong. The clinic has shifted to near Nandana Grand at ORR. Will post about the doctor after meeting him.

Doctors like him change the way humans are cared for .. I am an 100 percent advocate for his treatment and his services . Just go once , he will change your life.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited Dr. Basavaraj for our treatment. We had to visit for over an year and couple of procedures. Doctor is very knowledgeable and has vast experience. Nurses and other lab staff are good.  Initially the wait time was less .  while the wait time is on higher side since doctor does scan and procedures in parallel. The wait time doesn't change even with prior appointment . This is especially true in Marathahalli centre. This can be improved. I feel cost here for treatment is much lesser than any corporate hospitals or other centres. Doctor is mostly straight forward and not verbose which some might not like. Also doctor prescribes just enough medication which might or might not be good, hard to judge.

context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: After failing to conceive for a couple of years, we decided to consult the Doctor on recommendation of my gynaecologist since IVF was the only way I could have conceived(blocked tubes). And I am happy to share that we have been blessed with a healthy baby girl in Feb 2021. Doctor Is very kind, listens and explains every detail and overall a very nice person. The staff in his clinic are also very supportive. He takes care if consultation and also the procedures. I would highly recommend the doctor for fertility treatments. We have a baby girl in our arms today, all thanks to the support we received from him and his staff.

tags: Wait time,
review:
I had pcos for 15+ years..my cycle was irregular and was on conceptive pills..No dr gave me right treatment. We got to know about Dr basavraj on FB and post meeting him I felt I am in the right place after 2 cycle of follicle study and HCG injection I conceived naturally..now I have a healthy baby boy who turned 9 months..

Thank you Dr for your support..Because of you kind of people we can still have hope and happiness..
It is very good place for fertility and pregnancy file. I am having personal experience for pregnancy file. All over 5 out of 5 I am giving
He is one of the most professional gynaecologists I have ever been to! Quite friendly and approachable too! Explained the issue clearly. No over-medication.
